name: deviceState_getStatus
description: This function is used to retrieve the status of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to retrieve the status.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to retrieve the status.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to retrieve the status.
